```{r}
#| echo: false

library(FlickrAPI)
library(pixture)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(here::i_am("lgrs/Trieste.qmd"))
file_name <- here::here("data","flickr-photos.rds")
all_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)
htmlcode <- "<center>\n<img src='%s' width='%s'  height='%s'>\n<br/>\n**%s** by <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/jferrer/%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a><br/></center>"
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
seleccion <- c("paisaje con burros...", "sendero en la Sabana", "Pozo escondido", "Morichal")

photos <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) 
paths <- photos %>% pull(url_m)
captions <- photos %>% 
  transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong> por <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/jferrer/%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a>",title,id)) %>% pull()

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)

```
